timeline.message:
Rename method sin weeping vine feature as requested by @supercoder7979

Signed-off-by: liach <liach@users.noreply.github.com>

timeline.bodyText: VineHelper maybe? just Vines seems too ambiguous to me
timeline.author: SuperCoder7979

replies.bodyText: i use this name as we have Texts class. this holds a collision shape and an air check for root for those who want to suggest alternative names.
replies.author: liach
